title: ALIEN INVASION - 8-Bit Invaders! Gameplay
description:
8-Bit Invaders! Gameplay - Hey there!  This is my first look at the most recent expansion to the 8-Bit series called Invaders!  In this video we try out the Cranioids and then Baron joins us in Co-Op Campaign!  Enjoy the Video :D 

Baron's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3qSqrIqiwgAY4LE1YHRv0Q

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
